column4: Hi, I'm new to apt... How can I install Thunderbird using that? I'm on Breezer...
HumnToLife then i wasnt that long away.. ok, just so i know for the future.. if i dont know the whole name of the package i'm installing, can i do like this: "apt-get intsall *thunderbird*"
you can do apt-cache search thunderbird
that should return every package available with the name thunderbird in it
